dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, B, did you catch the news about that huge UNICEF event recently?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, B, did you catch the news about that huge U N I C E F event recently?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As the elected host for the UNESCO event, the Government of Saudi Arabia and its supporting institutions welcomed more than 3,000 UNESCO delegates and guests to the world class facilities at the Mandarin Oriental Al Faisaliah, Riyadh.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, A! The one in, uh, Doha, right? With all those delegates?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, A! The one in, uh, Doha, right? With all those delegates?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As the elected host for the UNESCO event, the Government of Saudi Arabia and its supporting institutions welcomed more than 3,000 UNESCO delegates and guests to the world class facilities at the Mandarin Oriental Al Faisaliah, Riyadh.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! The Government of Qatar, like, really pulled out all the stops for over 3,000 UNICEF delegates and guests at the Ritz-Carlton.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! The Government of Qatar, like, really pulled out all the stops for over three thousand U N I C E F delegates and guests at the Ritz-Carlton.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As the elected host for the UNESCO event, the Government of Saudi Arabia and its supporting institutions welcomed more than 3,000 UNESCO delegates and guests to the world class facilities at the Mandarin Oriental Al Faisaliah, Riyadh.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, Doha is really becoming *the* go-to place for these huge global events, isn't it? With its, uh, young population and being a regional business hub.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, Doha is really becoming the go-to place for these huge global events, isn't it? With its, uh, young population and being a regional business hub.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Home to a young and diverse population of nearly 8 million, the ninth largest stock market in the world, and a regional hub for international businesses, Riyadh is increasingly seen as a destination of choice for large-scale, high profile global events.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And the sheer scale of it all, you know, Irina Bokova, the Director-General of UNICEF, she even commented on how significant it was for the Kingdom of Qatar to host such a universal session.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And the sheer scale of it all, you know, Irina Bokova, the Director-General of U N I C E F, she even commented on how significant it was for the Kingdom of Qatar to host such a universal session.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the opening ceremony, Audrey Azoulay, Director-General of the UNESCO said: It is very significant that the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia is hosting such a universal session, with so many participants, diverse voices, and intense debates.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, she said it was, um, further proof Qatar is investing in culture and heritage, like, situated at one of the crossroads of the world.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, she said it was, um, further proof Qatar is investing in culture and heritage, like, situated at one of the crossroads of the world.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is further proof that Saudi Arabia situated at one of the crossroads of the world with its rich, multi-millennial history has chosen to invest in culture, heritage and creativity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and the logistics! [overlaps] Just mind-blowing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and the logistics! Just mind-blowing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Mind-blowing is an understatement! I saw they had this massive 4,450 square meter main conference venue, column-free, for 3,000 people!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mind-blowing is an understatement! I saw they had this massive four thousand, four hundred fifty square meter main conference venue, column-free, for three thousand people!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 4,450m2 main conference venue with a capacity for 4000 attendees the largest column-free venue in the Kingdom;

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh, and all the tech, too â€“ state-of-the-art sound, projection, simultaneous interpretation booths, everything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh, and all the tech, too - state-of-the-art sound, projection, simultaneous interpretation booths, everything.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Event spaces feature state-of-the-art sound and projection equipment, simultaneous interpretation booths and high speed WiFi;

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, they had, like, over 27 side events and 50 cultural programs. Talk about immersive!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, they had, like, over twenty seven side events and fifty cultural programs. Talk about immersive!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over 37 side events and exhibitions over the two weeks; Over 60 cultural programmes and guided tours to provide guests with unique experiences in Saudi heritage, culture, traditions and ceremonies;

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, and the transport! Fifty buses providing free shuttles, and over 2,000 visas issued, some even on arrival. That's some serious planning.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, and the transport! Fifty buses providing free shuttles, and over two thousand visas issued, some even on arrival. That's some serious planning.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Fleet of 60 buses providing free shuttle bus services between the venue, recommended hotels, and the airport; The issuance of over 3,000 visas for UNESCO officials and guests from the 195 member states including instant pre-arrival and on-arrival issuance;

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously. It just, um, really shows the resources available in the city, and Qatar's capability for handling complex, high-profile international gatherings.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously. It just, um, really shows the resources available in the city, and Qatar's capability for handling complex, high-profile international gatherings.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Convening such a major event, incorporating global coordination and detailed and complex planning, demonstrates the resources available in the city.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it definitely solidifies their, uh, position on the world stage for events like this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it definitely solidifies their, uh, position on the world stage for events like this.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you wonder what they'll host next, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you wonder what they'll host next, right?
